programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - A mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks. A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Pups Save the Spider Spies - The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.

programme.desc: Mango - It's wish-granter Mango, ready to make all the Roots and Fruits cast wishes come true.

programme.desc: Fig - It's the nicest, kindest, Fig, performing his song, "Just Can't Help Being Sweet!"

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grape Kids' Super Camp - Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Operation Kiwi - Supertato, Carrot and Tomato are exploring in the plant aisle when they hear a strange noise. They follow the noise and meet the famous Kiwi the Explorer, who needs their help.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep69
programme.desc: Toast - The Teletubbies eat lots of Tubby Toast and make a huge pile of crumbs. Luckily, The Noo-Noo is on hand to clean up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Peas - Dee encourages a friend to say peas and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Zip's Movie - As everyone else gets their films ready for a big movie night, Zip still doesn't know what his film should be about. He wonders whether he will have a film to show at movie night after all.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Float or Sink - Captain Messy plays pirates with his toys in a bowl of water, but why does his rubber duck float instead of sink?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Artificial Reef - Xuli finds a shipwreck on a coral reef and learns some glitches don't need to be fixed.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Easter - It's the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby European Pond Turtle - In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the Danube river in Vienna, Austria on a baby animal mission to help a newly hatched European pond turtle reach water. Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Mission: Sunflower Mystery - Tinks is excited to visit the allotments again with her owner Charli to see how tall their sunflowers have grown. Tinks is a disability assistance dog for Charli and helps Charli every day.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Jaguar and Anaconda - This episode features the jaguar and the anaconda. Their wild connection is is they are surprising swimmers.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep25
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed's Super Snippets - Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments, their super snippets, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Roly's First Day - As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep2
programme.desc: The Moving Badge - Snail is thrilled to be moving house as she wishes to escape the wet and sploshy place she currently calls home to a more spacious house on the hill.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Mount Everest, Asia - Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Grandmaster Glitch wants to watch his favourite DVD in peace, so uses his remote control to pause the Rio Carnival in Brazil!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep1
programme.desc: Free The Roads - Bulgy thinks that people should travel by bus instead of rail, that is until he tries carrying all their passengers.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Hair Cut - Sarah's hair keeps getting in her way, so it's time for a trip to the hairdressers.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Constable Quack - After their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah & Constable Quack are on the trail of a biscuit burglar.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Holiday - Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Dig - Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Coconut Safari Club - Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep9

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep22

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: ASTAF Sepaktakraw AsianCup Kuala Lumpur 2025 - Final (Thailand vs Malaysia)
programme.desc: Team Regu - The ASTAF Sepaktakraw Asian Cup 2025 is set to take place from May 10 to May 18, 2025, at the prestigious Titiwangsa Indoor Stadium in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. This exciting tournament will showcase the best Sepaktakraw talent from across Asia, bringing together top teams and athletes to compete in a vibrant and dynamic environment.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC307PereiravsRountreeJr
programme.desc: Two UFC title fights rock Salt Lake City as one of UFCs busiest and most dominant champions, Alex Pereira, puts his Light Heavyweight title on the line against fellow knockout artist Khalil Rountree Jr., and Raquel Pennington defends her Bantamweight belt for the first time against TUF rival and former champion Juliana Pea. Plus Jose Aldo returns to face Mario Bautista and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1004TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC310PantojavsAsakura
programme.desc: In the midst of a dominant reign atop the flyweight division, Alexandre Pantoja puts his belt on the line for a third time against Japanese star Kai Asakura, who looks to shock the world by winning a UFC title in his first trip to the Octagon. Plus, a shot at the welterweight title is up for grabs as unbeaten contenders Shavkat Rakhmonov and Ian Machado Garry collide, and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1103InternationalFighters
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts features explosive KOs from international fighters, showcasing stars from Russia, England, and South Africa like Dricus du Plessis, Paddy Pimblett, Ilia Topuria, and more.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland2
programme.desc: UFC 312 Countdown previews the promotions return to Sydney, where Dricus Du Plessis looks to defend his middleweight title against Sean Strickland in a rematch. Plus, strawweight champion Zhang Weili collides with wrestling phenom Tatiana Suarez.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs Teixeira
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten as a professional, Brazilian heavyweight phenom Tallison Teixeira has finished all his wins by knockout or submission, and on July 13, at Nashvilles Bridgestone Arena, he will face his toughest test yet in the UFCs all-time knockout king, Derrick Lewis. This five-round UFC Fight Night main event promises to be one of the most explosive of the summer, with Lewis aiming to follow-up his recent stoppage of Rodrigo Nascimento with another furious finish of a rising star with championship gold on his mind

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs Teixeira
programme.desc: Main Event - Unbeaten as a professional, Brazilian heavyweight phenom Tallison Teixeira has finished all his wins by knockout or submission, and on July 13, at Nashvilles Bridgestone Arena, he will face his toughest test yet in the UFCs all-time knockout king, Derrick Lewis. programme.title: UFC 317: Topuria vs. Oliveira
programme.desc: Prelims - Home to the UFC X Fan Experience and the UFC Hall of Fame ceremony, UFC International Fight Week 2025 will conclude on Saturday, June 28, with a stacked card at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas that features a highly anticipated lightweight bout between Brazilian superstar Charles Oliveira and former featherweight king Ilia Topuria. After vacating his 145-pound title to chase another world championship, Topuria will aim to follow up his knockouts of Alexander Volkanovski and Max Holloway with a finish of Oliveira, who is coming off a Fight of the Night win over Michael Chandler
